'''Sociedad Tolkien Uruguaya''' (Spanish:'''Uruguayan Tolkien Society''') is a Tolkien society based in Uruguay. Their goal is "sharing and disseminating the work of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and fantasy literature in general."<ref group=note>Translation of "Sociedad dedicada a compartir y difundir la obra de J.R.R. Tolkien y literatura fant√°stica en general."</ref> As of 2024 they are active on social media.<ref>[https://www.facebook.com/sociedadtolkienuruguaya/ Sociedad Tolkien Uruguaya Facebook]</ref>
